name: Rescue From Hell
description:
What brings you here
Lost soul?

A fast paced 2D platformer game with on click shooting. Play as a kobold and explore each level of Hell in search of your master. But beware, the deeper you go, the heavier the sin...

  • Current version consists of one level divided into three parts
  • The project is on undefined hiatus
  • Check out project's posts for more information!
